applet_name: Automatically change your Twitter profile pic when you update your Facebook photo
applet_description: Keep your social accounts in sync by updating your Twitter profile pic when your Facebook profile picture is changed.

applet_name: Keep a simple spreadsheet of every Tweet you post
applet_description: Create an archive of your Tweets in Google Drive for eary tracking and to see all your content at-a-glance. Turn on this Applet and we'll create a spreadsheet for you in a folder called "Twitter."

applet_name: Automatically save in Pocket the first link in a Tweet you like
applet_description: This Applet is super helpful for keeping your Pocket queue healthy and happy. Read articles from your favorite tweets on your own time!

applet_name: Forward twitter feed to telegram
applet_description: Forwards a specific applet feed to an IFTTT connected telegram channel.
applet_Trigger: New tweet by a specific user

applet_name: Tweet your Instagrams as native photos on Twitter
applet_description: Instagram photos will show up in your Twitter feed as a full image rather than a link. Note: only works for single photo posts.

applet_name: Recurring Tweets
applet_description: Recurring Tweets

applet_name: Automatically post on Twitter when you start streaming on Twitch
applet_description:
Who has time to Tweet when the latest game is waiting to be played?! Turn on this Applet and your Twitter followers will automatically be alerted when you start streaming with this Tweet and a link to your Twitch channel:
"I'm now streaming on Twitch! Playing [Name of game]"

applet_name: New tweet by specific user sends Discord message
applet_description: When the user you specify creates a new tweet, notify your Discord server in a Rich Text message.
applet_Trigger: New tweet by a specific user
applet_Action: Post a rich message to a channel

applet_name: Automatically tweet your new blog posts
applet_description: Don't let your followers miss an update: When you publish on Wordpress, this Applet will automatically send a tweet from your account with the post title and URL.

applet_name: Any new post on your bloggerPost a tweet with image to your twitter
applet_description:
Any new post on your blogger
Post a tweet with image to your twitter

applet_name: Track #hashtag mentions in a Google Spreadsheet
applet_description: Every time a certain #hashtag is used on Twitter, automatically track it in a Google Spreadsheet.

applet_name: If New tweet by specific user, then post a link to it in a Discord channel
applet_description: Enter the twitter user you want and customize which Discord server and channel to post in
applet_Trigger: New tweet by a specific user
applet_Action: Post a message to a channel

applet_name: Post to Slack when a tweet matches your search term
applet_description: A great way to stay up to date with tweets that matter to you. Use Twitter's advanced search to refine your search: https://support.twitter.com/articles/71577

applet_name: If Twitter #HASHTAG, Then IF Notification.
applet_description: Add a Hashtag (or search) for Twitter to follow, and expect IF notification.

applet_name: Twitter Mentions
applet_description: Twitter Mentions

applet_name: Twitter Advanced Search to IFTTT Notification
applet_description: Use a Twitter advanced search query to push a note containing a tweet as an IFTTT notification.
applet_Action: Send a rich notification from the IFTTT app

applet_name: Archive every tweet from a specific handle to a spreadsheet
applet_description: Keep a record of the tweets you care about ‚Äî enter the username you want to track (no need to include the "@" symbol) and they'll be saved in a Google spreadsheet. This is also a good workaround for accounts you don't want to follow on Twitter ‚Äî but still want to track!
applet_Trigger: New tweet by a specific user

applet_name: Timed Daily Tweet
applet_description: auto tweet everyday at a certain time

applet_name: Save the Tweets you like in Raindrop.io
applet_description: Keep a record of all of your Twitter activities directly on Raindrop.io

applet_name: Send a special message to your followers on Twitter
applet_description: Send a special message to your followers on Twitter
applet_Trigger: Every day of the week at

applet_name: Tweet new text posts from your Telegram channel
applet_description: An easy way to share new texts posted in your Telegram channel to Twitter. Your tweet will include a direct link to the post on Telegram, so don't worry too much about the character limit. Note that the @IFTTT bot needs to be an admin in your channel for this to work. P.S. Funny syntax optional STOP

applet_name: Get an email when there's a new tweet from a specific username
applet_description: Don't want to miss an amazing tweet from your mom/@Cher/@jack/[insert the username you want to watch here]? Use this Applet to get an email when they post!
applet_Trigger: New tweet by a specific user

applet_name: Automatically share new Instagram videos to Twitter
applet_description: Every time you post a new video to Instagram, it will be automatically posted to Twitter.

applet_name: Twitter 2 Telegram Pic
applet_description: Twitter 2 Telegram Pic

applet_name: tweet my instagram video
applet_description: tweet my instagram video

applet_name: Tweet your Facebook status updates
applet_description: Tweet your Facebook status updates

applet_name: Wordpress to Twitter with pic.twitter
applet_description: Every Wordpress post sends out a tweet with post title, url, and a pic.twitter image from the post.

applet_name: Automatically send a Tweet to thank new Twitter followers
applet_description: When someone follows you this will Tweet "Hey [their name] thanks for the follow!" Note: due to Twitter's terms of service it will not tag their Twitter handle.

applet_name: Twitter "Tweets" saved to Day One
applet_description: Every new tweet you tweet creates a Journal Entry in Day One with the tweet text and a link to the tweet.

Send a customizable twitter message whenever you start streaming.
Main tags {{Game}} {{ChannelUrl}}

applet_name: Save the Tweets you like on Twitter to a Google Spreadsheet
applet_description: A great way to archive and organize the Tweets you like on Twitter.

applet_description: Share your Twitter content to Linkedin when you use a hashtag of your choice.

applet_description: Choose a specific #hashtag below and whenever you include it in your photo's caption, it will automatically be tweeted. Note: only works for single photo posts.

applet_description: Every time you favorite a tweet this Applet will grab it and collect in an Evernote notebook named "Favorite tweets"

applet_description: A new liked tweet creates a Journal Entry in Day One with the tweet text, a single image, a link to the tweet, and @username.

applet_name: Share links to your Tweets automatically on a Facebook Page you manage
applet_description: Great if your active on Twitter but no so much on your Facebook Page. This Applet handles the automation for you.

applet_name: Tweet your new Tumblr posts
applet_description: When you create a new post on Tumblr, post a new tweet to Twitter with the post title, url, and tags.
